sentence.Network_en: We must civilize away the boy's bad habit.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们必须教育这孩子使其改掉恶习.

sentence.Network_en: "I think it would civilize people a bit more if they had decent conditions." — "I think you've hit the nail on the head."
sentence.Network_cn: “我认为，如果人们有良好的环境，就会更有教养一点。”——“我想你说到点子上了。”

sentence.Network_en: Those facilities are intended to civilize people.
sentence.Network_cn: 那些设施的目的在于教化民众.

PerfectNetExp.abs: C开头的单词_百度文库 ... civilization n. 文明，文化；开化 civilize vt. 使文明；教育 claim vt. 声称，主张；索取.
C开头的单词_百度文库 ... civilization n. 文明，文化；开化 civilize vt. 使文明；教育 claim vt. 声称，主张；索取.
大学英语精读单词表(第二册) - 豆丁网 ... civilized a. 文明的 civilize vt. 使开化，使文明 civilization n. 文明，文化.
有道单词本 - 豆丁网 ... civilization n. 文明；文化 civilize vt. 使文明；教化；使开化 clarify vt. 澄清；阐明.

list.abs: 这里需要说明一下本书中所使用的“文明”概念的内涵。“文明”(civilization)一词来源于拉丁文civis，而civis不仅是指罗马的公民身份，而且也含有比当时外国人或蛮族的原始生.
考博词汇下载（10000词汇完整版） - 豆丁网 ... citrus n． 柠檬； 柑橘 civilization n． 文明， 文化 civilize v． 使文明， 开化.
除此以外, 弗格森对“文明”的看法是相当宽容的。他认为“文明的”(civilized) 和“有教养的” (polished) 这些词汇具有温情脉脉的色彩, 是基于欧洲传统和商业文明而产生.
新加坡版中英文法律术语 - 豆丁网 ... citizen 公民；国民 civil 民事 civil action 民事诉讼.
民字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 民营〖 nongovernmentalbusiness〗 民用〖 civil;civilian;forciviluse〗 民怨〖 populardiscontent〗.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French civiliser, from civil 'civil'

entry.def: To civilize a person or society means to educate them and improve their way of life.

example.ex: ...a comedy about a man who tries to civilise a woman—but she ends up civilising him...
example.tran: 一出有关一个男人试图教化一个女人，结果反而被那个女人教化的喜剧

example.ex: It exerts a civilizing influence on mankind.
example.tran: 这产生了教化人类的影响。

means.word_mean: 1. train to be discriminative in taste or judgment;
2. raise from a barbaric to a civilized state;

sentences.sentence: "The wild child found wandering in the forest was gradually civilized"

auth_sentence.content: As though I had got a heavenly mission to civilize you.
auth_sentence.res_content: As though I had got a heavenly mission to civilize you.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: As though I had got a heavenly mission to civilize you.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ad加强[有"向"之意+vert转+ize……化,做等→使转向→[做广告]使其注意……
ag一再+grand大+ize……化,做等→一再大→扩大[权力]等
civil公民的+ize……化,做等→v.使开化,使文明,教化
critic批评家+ize……化,做等→v.[criticise]批评,评论
ex出+orc巫术,邪魔+ize……化,做等→v.驱魔,去除[坏念头等]
fertile肥沃的+ize表动词→v.使受精;施肥于,使肥沃
general总的,大体的+ize……化,做等→v.归纳,概括,推广,普及
lion狮子+ize……化,做等→把人当狮子一样看→崇拜
material物质+ize……化,做等→v.赋予形体,实现
neutral中间的,中和的+ize……化,做等→v.使无效,中和
popular流行的+ize…化,使…→v.[使]大众化,[使]普及,推广
public公众的+ize……化,做等→v.宣传,引人注意

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使复活,使重新充满活力
stems_affixes.word_buile: re重新+vital生命的+ize……化,做等→重新活
steril无菌的+ize……化,做等→v.使不育,杀菌
tempor时间+ize……化→时间化→拖延时间

jushi.english: The rough man has been civilized by his wife.
jushi.chinese: 那粗野的男人在妻子的开导下变得文雅了。

jushi.english: The missionaries intended to civilize the wild tribes of Africa.
jushi.chinese: 传教士们打算去教化非洲的野蛮部落。
